original_text: “Say to the Israelites: ‘On the fifteenth day of the seventh month the Lord’s Festival of Tabernacles begins, and it lasts for seven days.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 일곱째 달 열닷샛날은 초막절이니 여호와를 위하여 이레 동안 지킬 것이라

sentences.original_text: On the fifteenth day of the seventh month
the Lord's Festival of Tabernacles begins,
and it lasts for seven days.
